scripts.check:everything: echo check:everything && yarn run lint:all && yarn run check-format:all && yarn run typecheck:all && yarn run test:all && yarn run custom-check:all && yarn run check-build:all && yarn run check:do-not-merge && echo check:everything succeeded || {echo check:everything failed; exit 1}
scripts.check:do-not-merge: echo check:do-not-merge && bin/check-do-not-merge.sh && echo check:do-not-merge succeeded || {echo check:do-not-merge failed; exit 1}
scripts.check:todo-format: echo check:todo-format && bin/check-todo-format.sh && echo check:todo-format succeeded || {echo check:todo-format failed; exit 1}
scripts.check-build:all: echo check-build:all && yarn workspaces foreach -Apv run check-build && echo check-build:all succeeded || {echo check-build:all faied; exit 1}
scripts.check-format:all: echo check-format:all && yarn workspaces foreach -Apv run check-format && echo check-format:all succeeded || {echo check-format:all failed; exit 1}
scripts.clear:coverage: echo clear:coverage && yarn workspaces foreach -Apv exec rm -rf coverage && echo clear:coverage succeeded || {echo clear:coverage failed; exit 1}
scripts.fix-format: yarn run lint --fix && yarn run prettier --write --ignore-path .gitignore jest lambdas/bin
scripts.fix-format:all: echo format:all && yarn workspaces foreach -Apv run fix-format && echo fix-format:all succeeded || {echo fix-format:all failed; exit 1}
scripts.lint:all: echo lint:all && yarn workspaces foreach -Apv run lint && echo lint:all succeeded || {echo lint:all failed; exit 1}
scripts.custom-check:all: echo custom-check:all && yarn workspaces foreach -Apv run custom-check && echo custom-check:all succeeded || {echo custom-check:all faied; exit 1}
scripts.typecheck:all: echo typecheck:all && yarn workspaces foreach -Apv --topological-dev run typecheck && echo typecheck:all succeeded || {echo typecheck:all failed; exit 1}
scripts.test:all: echo test:all && time yarn workspaces foreach -Apv run test --runInBand && echo test:all succeeded || {echo test:all failed; exit 1}
scripts.test:all:coverage: yarn run clear:coverage && echo test:all:ci && time yarn workspaces foreach -Apv run test --ci --runInBand --coverage && echo test:all:ci succeeded || {echo test:all:ci failed; exit 1}
scripts.test:all:coverage:changed: yarn run clear:coverage && echo test:all:coverage:changed && time yarn workspaces foreach -Apv run test --ci --runInBand --coverage --changedSince=${0:-origin/master} && echo test:all:coverage:changed succeeded || {echo test:all:coverage:changed failed; exit 1}
